pullRequest.title: Implement all missing entities and remove overrides on default impl data values.  [1.14]

nodes.bodyText: if this is being added, please make sure it's prefixed by the package it's being added from (in this case api$projectileSource). It helps when debugging and whatnot to see what fields are being added from where.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,10 @@
+package org.spongepowered.common.mixin.api.mcp.entity.passive.horse;

nodes.bodyText: Remove these override that implement data methods. All data methods in the API are to be default implemented so that it all flows through the DataProvider system. If you find any interfaces that return a data instance that aren't default implemented, do us up a PR to fix that.

afterCommit.message: Implement all missing entities from 1.14 and remove old implementations of data values which override default methods.

nodes.bodyText: We'll need to add Optional<Value> to the Entity interfaces that have Values that may not exist so that everything goes through the DataProvider system and call that instead.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,22 @@
+package org.spongepowered.common.mixin.accessor.entity.passive;

nodes.bodyText: Using this api method is fine. It's an implementation toggle whether the PhaseTracker will be enabled to track Owner/Notifier information (see ChunkMixin_Tracker etc.)
Fairly sure you're right with the former.
You can eliminate the if statement since the ifPresent will already redundantly add this.
Same line annotation please, and prefix.
This can be removed entirely now.
Likewise doesn't need the if check.
Likewise don't need the if statement since the optional value will return empty.
Remove the if and the method targetPosition is going through the provider system.
Providers will know to filter on SpellType.NONE, so just call the api method for the current spell and the ifPresent will know if the value is empty or not.
Map to immutable, then do the ifPresent with method references.
Not something for this Mixin to figure out, it's for the DataProvider.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -48,14 +42,19 @@ public RabbitData getRabbitData() {
         return new SpongeRabbitData(RabbitTypeRegistryModule.RABBIT_IDMAP.get(this.getRabbitType()));

@@ -49,16 +45,20 @@ public DyeableData getDyeData() {
         return new SpongeDyeableData((DyeColor) (Object) this.getFleeceColor());

@@ -45,4 +45,14 @@
         manipulators.add(this.get(SittingData.class).get());

nodes.bodyText: Delete the if, the ifPresent covers the if.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -413,16 +406,6 @@ public JoinData getJoinData() {
         return new SpongeJoinData(SpongePlayerDataHandler.getFirstJoined(this.getUniqueID()).get(), Instant.now());

@@ -437,12 +420,6 @@ public GameModeData getGameModeData() {
         return new SpongeGameModeData((GameMode) (Object) this.interactionManager.getGameType());

@@ -84,4 +75,14 @@ public void setShooter(final ProjectileSource shooter) {
         manipulators.add(new SpongeAccelerationData(this.accelerationX, this.accelerationY, this.accelerationZ));

nodes.bodyText: Delete the if, it's covered by the ifPresent.
Delete the if, it's covered by the ifPresent.
Delete the if, isPresent will work fine as Gabe says below.
Delete all the getXXXData() methods like this, they no longer exist.
Be sure to delete these methods after you are done using them as a reference.

nodes.bodyText: Throw us a TODO here to merge custom and vanilla values and then return the result.
We're missing the value for the MobSpawner data.
Remove any unused shadows you find. Also remove this one as you don't use it anymore.
Good catch, I missed that one lol..

nodes.bodyText: Almost sure this field can be removed now.
There's all the keys for it, I think we missed adding the getters like the Spawner block entity has.

@@ -0,0 +1,67 @@

+package org.spongepowered.common.mixin.api.mcp.entity.projectile;
+
+import net.minecraft.entity.LivingEntity;
+import net.minecraft.entity.projectile.EvokerFangsEntity;
+import org.spongepowered.api.entity.projectile.EvokerFangs;
+import org.spongepowered.api.projectile.source.ProjectileSource;
+import org.spongepowered.asm.mixin.Mixin;
+import org.spongepowered.asm.mixin.Shadow;
+import org.spongepowered.common.mixin.api.mcp.entity.EntityMixin_API;
+
+import javax.annotation.Nullable;
+
+@Mixin(EvokerFangsEntity.class)
+public abstract class EvokerFangsEntityMixin_API extends EntityMixin_API implements EvokerFangs {
+
+    @Shadow private LivingEntity caster;
+
+    // Not all ProjectileSources are entities (e.g. BlockProjectileSource).
+    // This field is used to store a ProjectileSource that isn't an entity.
+    @Nullable public ProjectileSource api$projectileSource;
